description: TXN_APP_ORIG_SYS_XREF Reference key to account id of legacy system
TXN_SEQ The transaction sequence number
TXN_TCD_CODE Reference key to transaction
TXN_REASON_CD Reference key to lookup transaction reason
TXN_MODE_CD Reference key to lookup transaction mode
TXN_REFERENCE Reference information
TXN_COMMENT The error reason or comment for transaction posting
TXN_BALANCE_AMT The receivable balance after the posting of the current transaction
TXN_POST_DT Date when the transaction was posted to the system
TXN_DT Transaction effective date
TXN_AMT Transaction amount
TXN_PMT_AMT New payment amount
TXN_SPR_SPREAD Reference key to spread
PAL_AMT_ADV The payment amount allocated to Advance balance
PAL_AMT_INT The payment amount allocated to Interest balance
PAL_AMT_LC The payment amount allocated to Late Charge Fee balance
PAL_AMT_NSF The payment amount allocated to NSF Fee balance
PAL_AMT_OVERAGE The payment amount allocated to overage
PAL_AMT_EXT The payment amount allocated to Extension Fee balance
PAL_AMT_MEM The payment amount allocated to Membership Fee balance
PAL_AMT_OVR The payment amount allocated to Overlimit Fee balance
PAL_AMT_FADV The payment amount allocated to Advance Fee balance
PAL_AMT_PPP The payment amount allocated to Pre Payment Penalty Fee balance
PAL_AMT_OVR The payment amount allocated to Overlimit Fee balance
PAL_AMT_PPP The payment amount allocated to Pre Payment Penalty Fee balance
PAL_AMT_FADV The payment amount allocated to Advance Fee balance
PAL_AMT_MEM The payment amount allocated to Membership Fee balance
PAL_AMT_EXT The payment amount allocated to Extension Fee balance
TXN_PMT_AMT New payment amount
TXN_PRIMARY_IND Indicates whether the transaction is a primary transaction
TXN_CURRENCY_AMT Currency Transaction Amount
TXN_CUR_CURRENCY_CODE Reference key to Currency
TXN_EXTN_TERM New extension term
TXN_DUE_DT Due date of the billing transaction
CREATED_BY Standard Who
CREATION_DATE Standard Who
